sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO migr_generation_order ( id , connection_id_fk , object_id , object_type , generation_order ) VALUES ( #id# , #connectionIdFk# , #objectId# , #objectType# , #generationOrder# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE migr_generation_order SET id = #id# , connection_id_fk = #connectionIdFk# , object_id = #objectId# , object_type = #objectType# , generation_order = #generationOrder# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM migr_generation_order WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , connection_id_fk , object_id , object_type , generation_order FROM MIGR_GENERATION_ORDER WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.CONNECTION_ID_FK , A.OBJECT_ID , A.OBJECT_TYPE , A.GENERATION_ORDER FROM ( SELECT ID , CONNECTION_ID_FK , OBJECT_ID , OBJECT_TYPE , GENERATION_ORDER , ROWNUM FROM MIGR_GENERATION_ORDER WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM MIGR_GENERATION_ORDER WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
